alert.note: Alert for Judith Gap; Melville Foothills; Southern Rosebud; Southern Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 07 at 9:23AM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: .Heavy rainfall, from several days of strong thunderstorm activity, has saturated the soil across the watch area. Additional strong thunderstorms producing heavy rainfall today, have good potential to produce flash flooding given the saturated soil conditions. ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of central, south central, and southeast Montana, including the following areas, in central Montana, Golden Valley, Judith Gap, Musselshell and Southern Wheatland. In south central Montana, Melville Foothills and Treasure. In southeast Montana, Custer, Northern Rosebud and Southern Rosebud. This includes the BobCat, Peterson, and Richard Spring burn areas. * WHEN...Through this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Another round of strong slow moving thunderstorms is expected this afternoon and evening. Very heavy rainfall from any storms that do form will fall on already saturated soils, resulting in high flash flood potential across the watch area. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Judith Gap; Melville Foothills; Southern Rosebud; Southern Wheatland
